media:group.media:title: Translating Finnish Songs #3 | Puhekieli Practice (Tulipalo ğŸ”¥ Kuumaa)
media:group.media:description:
I randomly picked a Finnish song that was in the top 10 chart this week and went through it line by line. I think the most helpful aspect (of this song at least) is the abundance of puhekieli used in the lyrics. Hopefully it will help you get your head around puhekieli a bit bette!
